column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Their green tea mochi had an overwhelming flowery taste. Literally. If you had asked for a random piece of mochi ice cream (cut up into 4 pieces) and they told you to guess what flavor it was
column2: you would've guessed it was suppose to be some sort of rose mochi that was dyed green. It did not taste like green tea at all. I'm glad I did not order it and only had a piece of my friends. I would NOT HAVE BEEN HAPPY.
